sourcesContent:
import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import React, { useEffect,useRef } from 'react' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { setProducts ,removeProduct } from '../redux/reducers/allProdactReducer' import axios from 'axios' function Header() { const category = useRef(null) const dispatch = useDispatch() console.log(category.value) useEffect(() => { axios .get(`https://fakestoreapi.com/products/category/${category}`) .then((res) => { dispatch(setProducts(res.data)) }) return () => { dispatch(removeProduct()) } }, []) return ( <>
  • Home
  • electronics
  • jewelery
  • men's clothing
  • women's clothing
) } export default Header
